about_the_game:
The Exotica Pack includes the following:
- The Larva Drinker Suit
- The Trenchmouth Suit
- The Largo Decay Suit
- The Ezekiel Suit
- Tiki Party cell item
- Hula Girl cell item
- Coconut Drink cell item
- Tiki Mask cell item
- Ukulele cell item
- Totem cell item
- Beach Walls cell item
- Palm Trees cell item
- Stony Beach cell item
- 4 Exclusive E.S.O.P.s
- 3 Exclusive cell posters
- 3 Exclusive player icons

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains depiction of horror and gore elements such as blood, dead bodies and mutilation. Some nudity is also depicted

short_description: Travel the world from inside your cell with the Exotica Pack! The Exotica pack includes an exclusive set of 4 legendary outfits, E.S.O.P.s, cell items, cell posters and player icons so you can customize your horrific journey.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
